content: perfect for the rink or the cottage the hollanov socks are a coordinating mismatched sock pattern featuring striped cuffs inspired by the jerseys of *heated rivalry* the socks are knit cuff down with a 2x2 ribbed cuff slip_stitch heel flap square dutch heel turn and a grafted toe an abbreviated version of the instructions is included for the more experienced sock knitter along with a full set of adventurous beginner friendly instructions including techniques for clean color changes in ribbing and jogless stripes **sizes** size given is final sock circumference - include about 10% negative ease when selecting a size s 6 m 7 l 8 xl 9 **materials** us 1 2 25 mm needles set of dpns 32 circulars for magic loop 9 circulars or needles for your preferred small circumference method tapestry needle 2 stitch markers fingering weight yarn in the following amounts blue 109 124 140 155 yards black 116 132 149 165 yards white 24 27 30 34 yards red 7 8 9 10 yards yellow 4 4 5 5 yards
